title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:40 <jvdrean> has quit  
00:55 <jvelociter> has quit  
01:29 <abusenius> has quit  
03:43 <DrLou> has quit  
06:16 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
06:22 <sdumitriu> has quit  
06:22 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
06:22 <@sdumitriu> cjdelisle: You should always use -Pci when releasing  
06:22 <@cjdelisle> did I not?  
06:23 <@sdumitriu> For example, xwiki-rendering has a module that's executed only when the ci profile is activated  
06:23 <@sdumitriu> Not sure if you did or not, but the "script" doesn't use it  
06:23 <@sdumitriu> http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/ReleaseProcess#HCommandstoperformarelease  
06:24 <@cjdelisle> ah I see  
06:24 <@cjdelisle> sorry, if you are using it then feel free to update it with the changes ;)  
06:24 <@sdumitriu> Sure  
07:09 <jvelociter\_> has joined #xwiki  
07:12 <jvelociter> has quit  
07:13 <jvelociter\_> has quit  
07:40 <jamesxu> has joined #xwiki  
07:41 <jamesxu> Anyone can tell me how to write and run the custom rest service?  
07:52 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:21 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
09:46 <@sdumitriu> 3.2m1 released (maven part)  
09:46 <vmassol> cool  
09:46 <vmassol> thanks  
09:52 <@sdumitriu> This looks odd: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-tests/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-webstandards/837/testReport/org.xwiki.test.webstandards.framework/DefaultValidationTest/Validating\_XHTML\_validity\_for\_\_space\_XWiki\_u002C\_page\_ExtensionManager\_executed\_with\_credentials\_Admin\_admin/  
09:53 <vmassol> indeed  
09:53 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-4936  
09:53 <vmassol> oops  
09:53 <vmassol> wrong paste  
09:54 <vmassol> Caused by: org.codehaus.plexus.component.repository.exception.ComponentLookupException: Component descriptor cannot be found in the component repository: org.sonatype.aether.RepositorySystem [default] (lookup realm: ClassRealm[plexus.core, parent: null]).  
09:54 <vmassol> something is amiss  
09:54 <vmassol> can you reproduce it when you start XE?  
09:54 <@sdumitriu> 4AM, can't reproduce anything right now  
09:55 <@sdumitriu> But you can try downloading the m1 release :)  
09:55 <vmassol> sorry I won't have much time today, need to prepare slides all day I'm late already  
09:56 <jamesxu> has quit  
09:59 <jamesxu> has joined #xwiki  
10:05 <jamesxu> has quit  
10:08 <jamesxu> has joined #xwiki  
10:10 <vmassol> ahah he's removed his comment  
10:10 <@sdumitriu> Yep  
10:10 <vmassol> should we remove ours?  
10:10 <vmassol> or put back his?  
10:10 <@sdumitriu> Hm, mine's useful  
10:10 <vmassol> ;)  
10:10 <vmassol> well only with a context  
10:10 <@sdumitriu> OK, going to bed  
10:10 <@sdumitriu> Bye  
10:10 <vmassol> bye

11:22 <+mflorea> guys, what is the proper way to test  if a document holds a class definition. getXClass always returns a non null value, and I don't see any useful methods in BaseClass to detect if it's new.  
11:23 <vmassol> good question :)  
11:23 <vmassol> (meaning: I don't know)  
11:23 <+mflorea> :)  
11:25 <+sburjan`> sdumitriu: around ?  
11:25 <+mflorea> (11:10:50 AM) sdumitriu: OK, going to bed  
11:25 <+sburjan`> thanks  
11:26 <+mflorea> ;)  
11:26 <+sburjan`> it seems that the JAR installer is failing with a hibernate error  
11:26 <+sburjan`> Wrapped Exception: Hibernate Dialect must be explicitly set  
11:53 <+sburjan`> do we have a thread on dev list regarding 3.2M1 staging. Because I can't find it

15:21 <+jvelociter> hi guys  
15:21 <+jvelociter> should we create the 3.2M2 milestone in JIRA ?  
15:24 <+jvelociter> (now that the release branch has been created)  
15:24 <+jvelociter> vmassol: ?  
15:24 <vmassol> otp  
15:24 <+jvelociter> ok  
15:24 <vmassol> yes  
15:24 <+jvelociter> ok doing it  
15:35 <sburjan`> has quit  
16:03 <jvelociter> has quit  
16:12 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
16:16 <sdumitriu> has quit  
16:16 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
16:16 <@sdumitriu> cjdelisle: How did you solve the broken build last time, with the wrong hibernate configuration generated during release?  
16:19 <@cjdelisle> I rereleased into the staging repo.  
16:19 <@sdumitriu> So just re-release?  
16:20 <@sdumitriu> Looks like a flickering Maven bug then  
16:21 <@cjdelisle> I'm not entirely sure we're talking about the same thing. My problem was something to do with a bad pom file but I wasn't the one who fixed it.  
16:37 <Enygma`> has quit  
16:44 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
16:55 <kwoot> has joined #xwiki  
16:56 <kwoot> help, help! is somebody still available? I just upgraded tot 3.1 and my gui is all fucked up.  
16:57 <kwoot> I get a sort of light blue background and the menu is all over the top of the screen, overlaps other menu items. It is clearly not as it is meant to be.  
16:57 <kwoot> please?  
16:57 <@cjdelisle> Did you compare the changes to the xwiki.cfg file?  
16:58 <@cjdelisle> I think there's a change of the "base skin" from albitross to colibri and if you miss that change and use your old .cfg file, you will get that kind of problem.  
16:59 <kwoot> oof. albatross skin shows normal output. My heart is slowing down....  
16:59 <kwoot> ok. now I am soooo much more relaxed and I am going to have a closer look at the xwiki.cfg file. Thanks.  
16:59 <@cjdelisle> sure thing.  
17:00 <kwoot> Murphy's low: that always happens at the end of the workday :-)  
17:00 <@cjdelisle> /nod  
17:17 <kwoot> everything back to normal. time to go home and have some diner.  
17:17 <@cjdelisle> cool  
17:17 <kwoot> yep. Thanks man!  
17:17 <@sdumitriu> sburjan`: Can you re-check the build?  
17:18 <+sburjan`> sdumitriu: yes. only the jar ?  
17:19 <@sdumitriu> Only the jar for the moment  
17:24 <kwoot> has quit  
17:26 <+sburjan`> sdumitriu: works  
17:26 <+sburjan`> I think I tested a wrong version earlier  
17:26 <+sburjan`> meaning a older one  
17:26 <@sdumitriu> Hm, weird  
17:27 <+sburjan`> why ?  
17:27 <+sburjan`> didn't worked for you either ?  
17:27 <+sburjan`> I think I accidentally tested 3.1M1 instead of 3.2M1  
17:28 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
17:29 <@sdumitriu> I didn't test it at all  
17:31 <+sburjan`> it's everything ok  
17:31 <+sburjan`> brb
